Text:
Tracklist:

The Classic Experience III (disc 1)

1    Symphony No. 9 in E minor 'From the New World' Op. 95 - I. Allegro molto - Oslo Philharmonic Orchestra
2    Má vlast - Vltava (opening) (1986 Digital Remaster) - Staatskapelle Dresden
3    Má vlast - The Barber of Seville - Overture (abbrev.) - Riccardo Muti
4    Act I - Brindisi: Libiamo ne' lieti calici - John McCarthy
5    Act I - Die Fledermaus - Overture (abbrev.) - Münchner Rundfunkorchester
6    Act I - Symphony No. 4 in A 'Italian' Op. 90 - I. Allegro vivace (abbrev.) - Klaus Tennstedt
7    No. 12 - Divertissement: - Tea (Chinese Dance) - Royal Philharmonic Orchestra
8    Waltzes - No. 6 in D flat 'Minute' Op. 64 No. 1 - Dmitri Alexeev
9    Waltzes - Symphony No. 40 in G Minor, K.550 - I. Molto allegro (abbrev.) - Sir Neville Marriner
10    Waltzes - Chanson de matin, Op.15 No. 2 (1985 Digital Remaster) - Sir Adrian Boult
11    Waltzes - Concierto de Aranjuez - II. Adagio (abbrev.) - Angel Romero
12    Waltzes - Symphony No. 1 in A flat Op. 55 - I. Andante: nobilmente e semplice [i.e. opening only] - Sir Adrian Boult
13    Bachianas Brasileiras No. 5 (for soprano and 8 cellos) - I. Aria (Cantilena): Adagio - Enrique Bátiz
14    Les Pêcheurs de perles - Zurga, quand tous deux....Au fond du temple saint (Nadir, Zurga) - Ernest Blanc
15    Suite bergamasque - Clair de lune - Daniel Adni
16    Pagliacci (1989 Digital Remaster) - Recitar!...Vesti la giubba (Act I) - José Carreras
17    Nabucco - Va, pensiero (Chorus of Hebrew Slaves) - Ambrosian Opera Chorus
18    Nabucco - Cantata No. 208 'Sheep may safely graze' (arr. Marinner) - Ian Watson

The Classic Experience III (disc 2)

1    Piano Concerto No. 5 in E flat 'Emperor' Op. 73 (arr. Norman Bates, publ. EMI Music Publ. Ltd) - I. Allegro (abbrev.) - Cleveland Orchestra
2    Piano Concerto No. 5 in E flat 'Emperor' Op. 73 (arr. Norman Bates, publ. EMI Music Publ. Ltd) - The Hebrides (Fingal's Cave) - Overture Op. 26 (abbrev.) - André Previn
3    Piano Concerto No. 5 in E flat 'Emperor' Op. 73 (arr. Norman Bates, publ. EMI Music Publ. Ltd) - Scheherazade Op. 35 - III. The Young Prince and the Young Princess (abbrev.) - Philadelphia Orchestra
4    Piano Concerto No. 5 in E flat 'Emperor' Op. 73 (arr. Norman Bates, publ. EMI Music Publ. Ltd) - Peter and the Wolf Op. 67 - Medley of themes - Sian Edwards
5    L'Arlésienne - Suite No.2 (1990 - Remaster) - Farandole - Herbert von Karajan
6    No. 12 - Divertissement: - Trepak (Russian Dance) - Royal Philharmonic Orchestra
7    Ballet egyptien Op. 12 - Suite No.1 (1959 Digital Remaster) - I. Allegro non troppo (1959 Digital Remaster) - Anatole Fistoulari
8    The Tale of Tsar Saltan - The Flight of the Bumble-Bee (Act III) - Sir Neville Marriner
9    The Tale of Tsar Saltan - La Gioconda - Dance of the Hours (abbrev.) - Robert Irving
10    Gayaneh - Ballet highlights (1988 Digital Remaster) - Sabre Dance - Aram Il'yich Khachaturian
11    Gayaneh - Ballet highlights (1988 Digital Remaster) - The Sorcerer's Apprentice (extract) - Oslo Philharmonic Orchestra
12    Gayaneh - Ballet highlights (1988 Digital Remaster) - The Rite of Spring (Le Sacre du printemps) - extract - Philadelphia Orchestra
13    Gayaneh - Ballet highlights (1988 Digital Remaster) - España - Philadelphia Orchestra
14    Gayaneh - Ballet highlights (1988 Digital Remaster) - Capriccio italien Op. 45 (excerpt) - Paul Kletzki
15    Symphony No. 9 in D Minor, Op.125 'Choral' - Ode to Joy - Westminster Choir
